long_description: You might be inspired to go out and chop wood when you wear the prAna Sawyer jacket for men with its rugged, retro look. But then again, you might just want to wander down to the brew pub. Burly fabric contains 70% wool for natural warmth, and 30% nylon for increased durability. Wool insulates efficiently and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in wide-ranging conditions. High-loft Sherpa fleece lining increases the warmth factor. The prAna Sawyer jacket features a full front zipper for easy on/off and ventilation; snap chest pockets; welt hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: You might be inspired to go out and chop wood when you wear the prAna Sawyer jacket for men with its rugged, retro look. But then again, you might just want to wander down to the brew pub.
